accessStrategies.customDescription:
The metadata information is openly accessible but system instance aware.
The tenant is selected by providing a global tenant ID header.
To understand how to use this access strategy, please read the documentation on the [ORD Reference App Access Strategies](https://pages.github.com/SAP/open-resource-discovery-reference-application/blob/master/docs/README.md#access-strategies).

The metadata information is openly accessible but system instance aware.
The tenant is selected by providing a local tenant ID header.
To understand how to use this access strategy, please read the documentation on the [ORD Reference App Access Strategies](https://pages.github.com/SAP/open-resource-discovery-reference-application/blob/master/docs/README.md#access-strategies).
